text.config.pvz3-config.title: Plants vs. Zombies: Cubed
text.config.pvz3-config.option.nestedSpa: Hoe durability loss when finding PF
item.pvzmod.gardeninggloves: Use on a Plant to destroy them
item.pvzmod.sunflower_seed_packet.flavou: "Not to brag, but I'm pretty much your
item.pvzmod.wallnut_seed_packet.flavour2: Says so, right there on his resume.
item.pvzmod.snowpea_seed_packet.flavour2: the Great Freeze Tag Wars of '08.
item.pvzmod.chomper_seed_packet.flavour: "A free buffet? How kind! Don't mind if I do!"
item.pvzmod.repeater_seed_packet.flavour: "Yes! Yes! Let's do this! Let's do this!"
item.pvzmod.sunshroom_seed_packet.flavou: "Fun in the Sun? That's for other Plants.
I just make the stuff. I don't actually like it."
item.pvzmod.fumeshroom_seed_packet.flavo: I don't think they know how much that hurts."
item.pvzmod.hypnoshroom_seed_packet.flav: They have yet to convince a zombie to cluck
like a chicken. "One day," they say. "One day."
item.pvzmod.spikeweed_seed_packet.flavou: Quite similar to the region known
item.pvzmod.tallnut_seed_packet.flavour: Tall-nut is opening a chain of stores
item.pvzmod.tallnut_seed_packet.flavour3: "I'll shell out the savings to you!"
item.pvzmod.seashroom_seed_packet.flavou: disadvantaged Plants in his spare time.
item.pvzmod.magnetshroom_seed_packet.fla: Doesn't have a problem attracting girlfriends.
But does have a problem keeping them.
item.pvzmod.gatlingpea_seed_packet.flavo: There is no problem that cannot
item.pvzmod.gloomshroom_seed_packet.flav: Some see him as depressed, but he's got a lot of sides.
item.pvzmod.cattail_seed_packet.flavour: "My secret weapon? It's my cute little hat!"
item.pvzmod.spikerock_seed_packet.flavou: Being the most metal plant, Spikerock has decided
to hold his metal concert at Madison Rock Garden.
item.pvzmod.beet_seed_packet.flavour: Beet may be a roont, but he packs a punch.
item.pvzmod.shamrock_seed_packet.flavour: "Keep absolutely still. Its vision's based on movement."
item.pvzmod.chillypepper_seed_packet.fla: He looks cold, but maybe he's
Or, he could just be really cold.
item.pvzmod.vampireflower_seed_packet.fl: Always cast as the female lead in adaptations
of YA vampire novels. From twinlight,
item.pvzmod.retrogatling_seed_packet.fla: There is no problem that cannot
item.pvzmod.superchomper_seed_packet.fla: Played the T-Rex in Jurassic Garden.
item.pvzmod.dandelionweed_seed_packet.fl: "OH MY GOSH! A PEASHOOTER! OH MY GOSH! OH MY GOSH!"
item.pvzmod.bloomerang_seed_packet.flavo: I don't have a clue why they come back."
item.pvzmod.coconutcannon_seed_packet.fl: Exploding Zombies and Plants alike with
item.pvzmod.lightningreed_seed_packet.fl: "I do it for the shock value."
item.pvzmod.peapod_seed_packet.flavour: Sometimes they squabble, but they usually
item.pvzmod.peapod_seed_packet.flavour2: get along like five peas in a pod.
item.pvzmod.empeach_seed_packet.flavour2: to their robots! I HATE technology!"
item.pvzmod.firepea_seed_packet.flavour: "Is it getting hot in here or is it just me?"
item.pvzmod.endurian_seed_packet.flavour: It's fortunate that his body is spiky,
since he is autistic and hates touching.
item.pvzmod.goldleaf_seed_packet.flavour: Only gold shovels break the tile"
item.pvzmod.shadowshroom_seed_packet.fla: It may look like it's being rude,
but it just has a medical condition.
item.pvzmod.peanut_seed_packet.flavour: "Mom was a Peashooter. Dad was a nut.
item.pvzmod.ghostpepper_seed_packet.flav: Don't ever call her cute, or you will
end up in a mansion of jumpscares.
item.pvzmod.magnetoshroom_seed_packet.fl: Wanted to be a hero, but lived long enough
item.pvzmod.saucer_seed_packet.flavour: "I may be called Saucer, but I beg you,
item.pvzmod.saucer_seed_packet.flavour2: I don't taste good in sauce!"
item.pvzmod.dripphylleia_seed_packet.fla: Has a bad habit of wetting the bed.
item.pvzmod.pumpkinwitch_seed_packet.fla: One Imp's leg, one Gargantuar's teeth and a
zombie Bat's wing. The ingredients for my perfume.
item.pvzmod.hammerflower_seed_packet.fla: "I really wanna hammer the Zombie home."
item.pvzmod.meteorhammer_seed_packet.fla: "I would be blunt, if it wasn't for the spikes."
item.pvzmod.narcissus_seed_packet.flavou: who is the cutest of them all?"
item.pvzmod.impatyens_seed_packet.flavou: "I was a theater kid back in high school.
I could take on any role."
item.pvzmod.frisbloom_seed_packet.flavou: "Magnets? Gravity? Crikey, I asked my cousin and
even he doesn't know why they come back"
item.pvzmod.beautyshroom_seed_packet.fla: Aspires to be as fab as Perfoom-shroom.
item.pvzmod.charmshroom_seed_packet.flav: "Lucky charm? How about a love charm?"
[You feel dizzy as you are losing consciousness...]
item.pvzmod.smackadamia_seed_packet.flav: He may not be able to spit fire,
but he can drop these nuts.
item.pvzmod.locococo_seed_packet.flavour: He crowned himself King of All Hollow Earth.
No one had the heart to tell him it
item.pvzmod.zapricot_seed_packet.flavour: "Some say that Zombies aren't easily shocked.
item.pvzmod.bananasaurus_seed_packet.fla: She's a banana first and a dinosaur second.
item.pvzmod.weeniebeanie_seed_packet.fla: I prefer to be called a "Little Beanie."
item.pvzmod.navybean_seed_packet.flavour: Was *this* close to becoming an Army Bean.
"Heavy is the weight of my command.
And my cap. Heavy is the cap."
item.pvzmod.jumpingbean_seed_packet.flav: I can also leap and vault!"
item.pvzmod.sunflowerseed_seed_packet.fl: "Mommy, where do little Sunflowers come from?"
item.pvzmod.knightpea_seed_packet.flavou: Your interpretation is correct either way.
item.pvzmod.gambleshroom_seed_packet.fla: The Plants vs. Zombies: Cubed team does not endorse gambling.
entity.pvzmod.speaker: Speaker
